meanings.definition: A person who follows the teachings of Maxime de la Rochefoucauld.
meanings.sent1: As a dedicated maximites, Sarah studied and embraced the ideas of Maxime de la Rochefoucauld.
meanings.sent2: The maximites gathered to discuss and understand the wisdom of Maxime de la Rochefoucauld.
meanings.sent3: The maximites threw a party where they only spoke in quotes from Maxime de la Rochefoucauld.
meanings.sent4: In the world of philosophy, the maximites shine brightly like stars following the path of Maxime de la Rochefoucauld.
meanings.sent5: The maximites' devotion to Maxime de la Rochefoucauld was unwavering and inspiring.

meanings.definition: The followers or supporters of Maxime de la Rochefoucauld.
meanings.sent1: Maxime de la Rochefoucauld's ideas attracted many maximites who admired and supported him.
meanings.sent2: The maximites organized events to promote the works of Maxime de la Rochefoucauld.
meanings.sent3: The maximites proudly displayed their allegiance to Maxime de la Rochefoucauld with matching t-shirts.
meanings.sent4: Like a flock of birds following a leader, the maximites followed Maxime de la Rochefoucauld's teachings.
meanings.sent5: The community of maximites grew stronger as they shared their love for Maxime de la Rochefoucauld.
